## Summary

Take home messages

- ANNs can capture higher order correlations

- ANNs are universal approximators

- Keras is a high level API aiming at maximising modeling exploration by minimising model creation effort

- _"Being able to go from idea to result with the least possible delay is key to doing good research"_ (F. Chollet)
